page.title: 04PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content:
Evening entertainment includes a
singalong around the organ every Saturday and Sunday.
{THE FLOUCH The impressive building of "The New Flouch" built in the 1940's looks out across the site of the Old Flouch. The new pub is a bustling place with a lively atmosphere. A large room has been singled out to house a high class restaurant serving dinners (soup ,fruit and prawn cocktail for starters beef, steaks and chicken amongst the main courses, fruit pies, ice cream cream gateaux and tarts for desserts, finishing off with cream coffee and mints). The restaurant is open evenings 7.30 to 11.00 pm and dinner times 11.30 to 2.00 pm.
